title: 11/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Carson Palmer
itunes:title: 11/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Carson Palmer
description:
Carson Palmer talks to Dan about Lincoln Riley getting hired to USC. Carson says this is great news and a win/win for the Trojans.
